TopicTitle: The 0.25 Waiting Room, now boarding passengers heading to Hypetown

Articles.Content:
KSP: Keeping the F5 key industry going since 2011

"I'd like to order 5000000 F5 keys, oh, and a lifetime supply of Duna Bars too, what? You don't sell Duna bars? WHAAAATTTT?!?!?!"

*cue singularity*
F5? Ha! Ctrl + R is better

F5? Ha! Ctrl + R is better

Wow, is it bad that i didn't know Ctrl + R was refresh?

Thanks though. Now i have an alternative to clicking like last year when my F5 key broke!

Edited September 30, 2014 by worir4
Boarding Hype-Train!

Wait, is 0.25 launching today!? NOOOOOO!

I just got back from a hiatus and updated mods for 0.24.2.... now none of my mods will work!
I havent been on the forums for 2 days! And the update is TODAY! But wait, So is danny's video, coincidence? I think not!

Wait what, it's today????? Where????? *Runs around in circle out of desperation*

WHERE!!!!!!! *Brain over loads and sets on fire*

Edited September 30, 2014 by worir4
The HypePlane will need a source before the HypeSuperluminar Drive is activated.

I havent been on the forums for 2 days! And the update is TODAY! But wait, So is danny's video, coincidence? I think not!

OMGOMGOMGOMGOMGOMG, TODAY?! YES AWESOME HYPEHYPE!

Wait... Now wait a minute... did you just make that up? I don't thing today's the day yet.

But I guess there IS a Danny special vid!

Wait, is 0.25 launching today!? NOOOOOO!

I just got back from a hiatus and updated mods for 0.24.2.... now none of my mods will work!

Not sure if update is today, or you just played a prank on us...

Not sure if update is today, or you just played a prank on us...

I vote for prank, but there are still some hours left

Not sure if update is today, or you just played a prank on us...

NOOOO, i just got super hyped and now i have been deflated like a balloon...

Gregox i need some sleeping pills tonight.
I just got back from work to find a distinct lack of preview videos.

They aren't going to have the game release before they have the media release. We will see youtube videos from HOCGaming, Danny2462, EnterElysium, and Scott Manley (and maybe a few others I don't know of) before we see a download.

See, if I had activated the HypeSuperluminal Drive, everything for five miles would have been disintegrated.

Serious Mode: Don't mess with us like that, it just makes people annoyed at you.

I feel like an old man, scoffing at these young whippersnappers getting excited about release, knowing that it's too late in the day, the media release hasn't happened yet, my left knee isn't aching (it has a sense for when the updates come). I've seen some serious stuff in my time...
Well i suppose i'll be going to college tomorrow then after all...

This

lead to this

Be carefull...
The HypeSuperluminal Drive is only activated at the very moment of release, when Hype is highest and we break the light barrier.
Ha, I really wasn't pranking, I just read the last few posts and misunderstood what everyone was talking about, and I was at work so I couldn't check the version of KSP on steam.

Ooh, a wild devnote appears!

It sounds positive~

Hype Train or Plane?

I got mine!

Ooh, a wild devnote appears!

It sounds positive~

Where? Link, dammit!

Get set for some of your favorite KSP Youtubers to unleash havoc on 0.25 this Saturday, October 4. If thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not enough, KSP-TVÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s going to be playing 0.25 live for you all weekend. In short, if the poster-child media streamers (Manley, etc) wont be streaming until this weekend, we wont be seeing the 0.25 patch until next week.

Link to dev blog here: http://kerbaldevteam.tumblr.com/post/98847223109/devnote-tuesdays-the-calm-before-the-storm-edition
I guess the smart money's on a Tuesday release. (Disclaimer: I have never guessed a release time correctly.)
